content: #6696 does not introduce new mathematical content. Rather it puts the files on (graph theory) cliques and triangles into their own folder (and removes a Triangle folder because a triangle is a special case of a clique). See the PR description for more
The aim is to eventually have Turán's theorem in this new folder
Hmm, I'm not sure I agree. I have more triangle-specific files incoming.
Then you can just put your triangle-specific files in a Triangle subfolder of the Clique folder
It sounds like the compromise is to add the clique folder but not remove the triangle folder at the same time?
